pages.title: 相册
pages.text: //------------------------------------------------ var div = document.querySelector('#gallery'); //------------------------------------------------ var album_info = [//相册信息：0路径，1图片名，2标题，3子标题 ["2023/11/13/00-04-07/", "IMG20221213183712.jpg", "奶昔", "近期照片"], ["2023/11/14/13-39-05/", "IMG20201201173650.jpg", "奶昔", "早期照片"], ] var image_path = "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/"; var image_quality = "?x-oss-process=image/resize,m_lfit,w_200/quality,q_90"; //------------------------------------------------ let loop = 2; let gallery = ""; for (let i = 0; i < loop; i++) { var html_str = " \ \ \ \ \ title \ subtitle \ \ \ \ "; html_str = html_str.replace("post_path", album_info[i][0]); html_str = html_str.replace("image_path", image_path + album_info[i][1] + image_quality); html_str = html_str.replace("title", album_info[i][2]); html_str = html_str.replace("subtitle", album_info[i][3]); gallery += html_str; } div.innerHTML = gallery;

"https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/gannan/P1026854.JPG", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/gannan/P1026921.JPG", ]; var image_quality = "?x-oss-process=image/resize,m_lfit,w_200/quality,q_90"; var image_path = image_list[0];//封面路径 var post_path = "2024/01/24/20-28-33/";//帖子路径 //------------------------------------------------ var _path = window.location.pathname; if (_path == "/") { let html_str = " \ \ \ \ "; html_str = html_str.replace("post_path", post_path); html_str = html_str.replace("image_path", image_path + image_quality); div.innerHTML = html_str; } else { let images = ""; for (let i = 0; i < image_list.length; i++) { let html_str = " \ \ \ \ "; let quality = "?x-oss-process=image/quality,q_60"; let image_path = image_list[i] + quality; html_str = html_str.replace("image_path", image_path); images += html_str; } let album = "images"; album = album.replace("images", images); div.innerHTML = album; }

posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
